sig_info: While at 7 Cruelty Passives, Ronin gains a Passive Evasion on the next incoming hit for 0.4 to 1.5 seconds. Removes 3 Cruelty Passives when Ronin Evades an attack. Successful Evades do not grant Stance Abilities.
When Ronin Evades an attack, gain a Fury Passive increasing Attack Rating by 11.05 to 16.98 for 12 seconds.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: When Ronin would Miss an Attack or be Evaded he gains a Cruelty Passive increasing Critical Damage by 197.75. Max 7 stacks.
SWORD ATTACKS: Attacks using the Sword have a 15% chance to inflict Bleed dealing 29.75 Direct Damage over 3.50 seconds. Critical Strikes using the Sword have a 100% to inflict Bleed.
Intercepting attacks has +1066.67 Critical Rating.
Against Bleed Immune Champions gain a Cruelty Passive when Ronin would inflict a Bleed. This cannot occur more than once every 2.5 second(s).
STANCE PREPARATION: Ronin prepares his Stances by performing light attacks. Light 1 prepares Guard Stance, Light 2 prepares Wraith Stance, and Light 3 prepares Demon Stance.
Dodging back after preparing a stance makes Ronin enter a Stance. Stances are not affected by Ability Accuracy Reduction.
When entering a new Stance, gain a Cruelty Passive increasing Critical Damage by 197.75. Max 7 stacks.
WHEN ENTERING A STANCE: When reaching 7 Cruelty Passives, gain a Precision Passive increasing Critical Rating by 2971.43 for 18 seconds.
GUARD STANCE: Well Timed Blocks activate the Parry Mastery, stunning opponents even if their attack is non-contact. Ronin gains +35% chance to Perfect Block.
Entering this stance has a 100% chance to Purify a Debuff.
WRAITH STANCE: All attacks reduce Defensive Ability Accuracy by 40%.
DEMON STANCE: All Bleeds gain +75% Ability Accuracy and can be inflicted on Blocked hits.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Disorients the opponent reducing Defensive Ability Accuracy by 60% and Block Proficiency by 50% for 9 seconds.
Enters a prepared Stance.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Inflicts a Bleed that deals 29.75 Direct Damage over 3.50 seconds for each active Cruelty Passive.
Removes all Cruelty Passives.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain a Fury Passive increasing Attack Rating by 22.1 for 35 seconds. Each active Cruelty Passsive increases the Attack Rating by an additional 22.1.
Removes all Cruelty Passives.

sig_info: While at 7 Cruelty Passives, Ronin gains a Passive Evasion on the next incoming hit for 0.4 to 2 seconds. Removes 3 Cruelty Passives when Ronin Evades an attack. Successful Evades do not grant Stance Abilities.
When Ronin Evades an attack, gain a Fury Passive increasing Attack Rating by 121.16 to 186.4 for 12 seconds.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: When Ronin would Miss an Attack or be Evaded he gains a Cruelty Passive increasing Critical Damage by 241.01. Max 7 stacks.
SWORD ATTACKS: Attacks using the Sword have a 15% chance to inflict Bleed dealing 326.2 Direct Damage over 3.50 seconds. Critical Strikes using the Sword have a 100% to inflict Bleed.
Intercepting attacks has +1300 Critical Rating.
Against Bleed Immune Champions gain a Cruelty Passive when Ronin would inflict a Bleed. This cannot occur more than once every 2.5 second(s).
STANCE PREPARATION: Ronin prepares his Stances by performing light attacks. Light 1 prepares Guard Stance, Light 2 prepares Wraith Stance, and Light 3 prepares Demon Stance.
Dodging back after preparing a stance makes Ronin enter a Stance. Stances are not affected by Ability Accuracy Reduction.
When entering a new Stance, gain a Cruelty Passive increasing Critical Damage by 241.01. Max 7 stacks.
WHEN ENTERING A STANCE: When reaching 7 Cruelty Passives, gain a Precision Passive increasing Critical Rating by 3621.43 for 18 seconds.
GUARD STANCE: Well Timed Blocks activate the Parry Mastery, stunning opponents even if their attack is non-contact. Ronin gains +35% chance to Perfect Block.
Entering this stance has a 100% chance to Purify a Debuff.
WRAITH STANCE: All attacks reduce Defensive Ability Accuracy by 40%.
DEMON STANCE: All Bleeds gain +75% Ability Accuracy and can be inflicted on Blocked hits.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Disorients the opponent reducing Defensive Ability Accuracy by 60% and Block Proficiency by 50% for 9 seconds.
Enters a prepared Stance.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Inflicts a Bleed that deals 326.2 Direct Damage over 3.50 seconds for each active Cruelty Passive.
Removes all Cruelty Passives.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain a Fury Passive increasing Attack Rating by 242.32 for 35 seconds. Each active Cruelty Passsive increases the Attack Rating by an additional 242.32.
Removes all Cruelty Passives.
